definitions.text: an elaborate or deceitful scheme contrived to deceive or evade
examples: his testimony was just a contrivance to throw us off the track

definitions.text: a statement that evades the question by cleverness or trickery
make a sudden movement in a new direction so as to avoid
examples: The child dodged the teacher's blow

definitions.text: move to and fro or from place to place usually in an irregular course
examples: the pickpocket dodged through the crowd

definitions.text: avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing (duties, questions, or issues)
examples: They tend to evade their responsibilities
